data.name: No Momentum
data.detailed_description:
No Momentum is a portal based action-packed game that features a fast-paced style of gameplay with wild open areas mixed in with closed in small areas. It follows a lost person left to die in the facility of a thousand corridors. He was abandoned and thrown into the chamber when his life suffered the most. Now he must use his portal-gun to evade the dangers and face off against the originator of the horrors.

You must traverse your way through the facilities, warehouses, and mansions in your way while fighting any obstacles in your way including DOB!

This game is a great way to experience a fun and explorable environment while flying through portals left, right and centre. The only question is... Are you ready for what's ahead...

This experience will also include boss fights, power-ups, fast-paced action and big open areas!

NOTE: The screenshots shown above were taken on lower graphical settings.

data.short_description: No Momentum is a portal based action-packed game that features a fast-paced style of gameplay with wild open areas mixed in with closed in small areas. Use your portal gun to fight back!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 8
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i9 9th Gen
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 1080Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.15
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 1080Ti
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
